resources.string: This application is designed to help you calculate the quality of your armour pieces.
Enter data into cells provided for Intellect, Discipline and Strength.
Cells must not be left blank i.e. Must have a zero if attribute does not contain a stat.
Press the \'SHOW TIER\' button to reveal total figures and overall \'tier\' of armour set.
A Class Name can be entered into the provided field.
Once Class Name has been entered and SHOW TIER has been selected, press \'SAVE\' to insert values into database
To view saved values, press the \'DATABASE\' button.
Data entered must be base stats excluding upgrade bonus. See \'INFO\' page for bonus amounts.
Each piece of armour can roll with a maximum of two attributes plus a bonus once upgraded
Each attribute is capped at 300 points (tier 5).
To achieve their 12, two attributes require tier 5 plus tier 2 (120 points) on a third attribute.
It is possible to achieve greater than 100% on artifacts.
